mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_oa_sendform ( id, title, no, draft_dep_id, draft_dep, draftor_id, draftor_name, main_dep_id, main_dep, sub_dep_id, sub_dep, print_count, secret_class, urgent_class, year, month, quarter, status, create_date, update_date, comment, type, content, remark, charge_man_id, charge_man, contractor_id, contractor, draft_advice, submit_advice, deadline, doc_legality, attachment, confidential_review, lead_instructions, sign_unit, issuer_instructions, creator_id, log_flag, nuclear_draft, office_nuclear, mobile, open ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{no}, #{draftDepId}, #{draftDep}, #{draftorId}, #{draftorName}, #{mainDepId}, #{mainDep}, #{subDepId}, #{subDep}, #{printCount}, #{secretClass}, #{urgentClass}, #{year}, #{month}, #{quarter}, #{status}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{comment}, #{type}, #{content}, #{remark}, #{chargeManId}, #{chargeMan}, #{contractorId}, #{contractor}, #{draftAdvice}, #{submitAdvice}, #{deadline}, #{docLegality}, #{attachment}, #{confidentialReview}, #{leadInstructions}, #{signUnit}, #{issuerInstructions}, #{creatorId}, 0, #{nuclearDraft}, #{officeNuclear}, #{mobile}, #{open} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_oa_sendform
title=#{title},
no=#{no},
draft_dep_id=#{draftDepId},
draft_dep=#{draftDep},
draftor_id=#{draftorId},
draftor_name=#{draftorName},
main_dep_id=#{mainDepId},
main_dep=#{mainDep},
sub_dep_id=#{subDepId},
sub_dep=#{subDep},
print_count=#{printCount},
secret_class=#{secretClass},
urgent_class=#{urgentClass},
year=#{year},
month=#{month},
quarter=#{quarter},
status=#{status},
create_date=#{createDate},
update_date=#{updateDate},
comment=#{comment},
type=#{type},
content=#{content},
remark=#{remark},
charge_man_id=#{chargeManId},
charge_man=#{chargeMan},
contractor_id=#{contractorId},
contractor=#{contractor},
draft_advice=#{draftAdvice},
submit_advice=#{submitAdvice},
deadline=#{deadline},
doc_legality=#{docLegality},
attachment=#{attachment},
confidential_review=#{confidentialReview},
lead_instructions=#{leadInstructions},
sign_unit=#{signUnit},
issuer_instructions=#{issuerInstructions},
creator_id=#{creatorId},
log_flag=#{logFlag},
nuclear_draft=#{nuclearDraft},
office_nuclear=#{officeNuclear},
mobile=#{mobile},
open=#{open},
WHERE id =#{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_oa_sendform ( id, title, no, draft_dep_id, draft_dep, draftor_id, draftor_name, main_dep_id, main_dep, sub_dep_id, sub_dep, print_count, secret_class, urgent_class, year, month, quarter, status, create_date, update_date, comment, type, content, remark, charge_man_id, charge_man, contractor_id, contractor, draft_advice, submit_advice, deadline, doc_legality, attachment, confidential_review, lead_instructions, sign_unit, issuer_instructions, creator_id, log_flag, nuclear_draft, office_nuclear, mobile, open, ) VALUES ( #{map.id}, #{map.title}, #{map.no}, #{map.draftDepId}, #{map.draftDep}, #{map.draftorId}, #{map.draftorName}, #{map.mainDepId}, #{map.mainDep}, #{map.subDepId}, #{map.subDep}, #{map.printCount}, #{map.secretClass}, #{map.urgentClass}, #{map.year}, #{map.month}, #{map.quarter}, #{map.status}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.updateDate}, #{map.comment}, #{map.type}, #{map.content}, #{map.remark}, #{map.chargeManId}, #{map.chargeMan}, #{map.contractorId}, #{map.contractor}, #{map.draftAdvice}, #{map.submitAdvice}, #{map.deadline}, #{map.docLegality}, #{map.attachment}, #{map.confidentialReview}, #{map.leadInstructions}, #{map.signUnit}, #{map.issuerInstructions}, #{map.creatorId}, #{map.logFlag}, #{map.nuclearDraft}, #{map.officeNuclear}, #{map.mobile}, #{map.open}, )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_oa_sendform
AND title Like '%${condition.title}%'
AND no Like '%${condition.no}%'
AND draft_dep_id Like '%${condition.draftDepId}%'
AND draft_dep Like '%${condition.draftDep}%'
AND draftor_id Like '%${condition.draftorId}%'
AND draftor_name Like '%${condition.draftorName}%'
AND main_dep_id Like '%${condition.mainDepId}%'
AND main_dep Like '%${condition.mainDep}%'
AND sub_dep_id Like '%${condition.subDepId}%'
AND sub_dep Like '%${condition.subDep}%'
AND print_count Like '%${condition.printCount}%'
AND secret_class Like '%${condition.secretClass}%'
AND urgent_class Like '%${condition.urgentClass}%'
AND year Like '%${condition.year}%'
AND month Like '%${condition.month}%'
AND quarter Like '%${condition.quarter}%'
AND status Like '%${condition.status}%'
AND create_date Like '%${condition.createDate}%'
AND update_date Like '%${condition.updateDate}%'
AND comment Like '%${condition.comment}%'
AND type Like '%${condition.type}%'
AND content Like '%${condition.content}%'
AND remark Like '%${condition.remark}%'
AND charge_man_id Like '%${condition.chargeManId}%'
AND charge_man Like '%${condition.chargeMan}%'
AND contractor_id Like '%${condition.contractorId}%'
AND contractor Like '%${condition.contractor}%'
AND draft_advice Like '%${condition.draftAdvice}%'
AND submit_advice Like '%${condition.submitAdvice}%'
AND deadline Like '%${condition.deadline}%'
AND doc_legality Like '%${condition.docLegality}%'
AND attachment Like '%${condition.attachment}%'
AND confidential_review Like '%${condition.confidentialReview}%'
AND lead_instructions Like '%${condition.leadInstructions}%'
AND sign_unit Like '%${condition.signUnit}%'
AND issuer_instructions Like '%${condition.issuerInstructions}%'
AND creator_id Like '%${condition.creatorId}%'
AND log_flag Like '%${condition.logFlag}%'
AND nuclear_draft Like '%${condition.nuclearDraft}%'
AND office_nuclear Like '%${condition.officeNuclear}%'
AND mobile Like '%${condition.mobile}%'
AND open Like '%${condition.open}%'
order by ${condition.sort}
limit ${offset}, ${rows}
